DOCNAME: CASE OF KAYIHAN AND OTHERS v. TURKEY
CONCLUSION: Violation of P1-1;Not necessary to examine Art. 14+P1-1;Pecuniary damage - financial award;Non-pecuniary damage - finding of violation sufficient
TEXT: CARDINAL . The General Directorate of National Water Board , a state body responsible for dam construction , expropriated plots of land belonging to the applicants in PERSON , ORG in order to build LOC . Expropriation took place in DATE . A committee of experts assessed the value of the plots of land belonging to the applicants and this amount was paid to them when the expropriation took place .

CARDINAL . Following the applicants ' requests for increased compensation , ORG Instance awarded them CARDINAL PERSON ( GPE ) of additional compensation plus interest at the statutory rate of PERCENT per annum , namely the rate applicable at the date of the court 's decision . The domestic court had fixed CARDINAL DATE as the date from which the statutory rate of interest run . On DATE , on the ORG 's appeal , ORG upheld the first instance court 's decision . On DATE the administration paid CARDINAL NORP Liras ( GPE ) as the additional compensation awarded to the applicants together with the interest .
CARDINAL . The relevant domestic law and practice are set out in the Aka v. GPE judgment of DATE ( Reports of Judgments and Decisions CARDINAL-VI , pp . DATE , § § DATE ) .
